post.body: made delicious cookies. Delicious+Cookies= Dookies! No Sounds too much like Dooky. I'm sure that "shit" isn't what she was going 4
now we know why their called temps. Temporary lives, not jobs. He/she should have read the fine print. Stupid placement agency!
I got my cookies. I saw that @Joeschmitt got his, so you were about to get the wrath, but then mine arrived. Crisis averted!
now thats some funny shit!
What kind of sauce? Don't get any on ya!
like no way dude!
Well written sir! Any questions?
velour is the new economy's cashmere.
Dexter is starting to blur the line between his dissociative personality disorder/ sociopathy and his new "family" life.
or "Fly like an eagle" by The Steve Miller Band.
You should use "Basketball" by Curtis Blow. Go super old school.
I see that you are receiving offers of cheer. I am not very good at that, so I *was* going to offer beer, but this is my last one.
Its like snow chains for your shoes. A plus when escaping on foot during the winter months. I mean, so I've read.
Always been a fan of the Ocean. Even if that does mean I have 2 fraternize with the Caribbean Queen and Lover Boy. Oh no he didnt!
what Barack Obama says on his first day in office. Oh, I thought we were playing Tweopardy.
It's like "The Cure" meets "American Hi-Fi". Catchy tunes, but something mainstream and douchey about it.
So true. @MissRFTC is the Lord, @AprilSTL is the vassal, and I am the serf. It's Tweudalism! I am stuck in the Twiddle Ages.
let me check. Its the playoffs, so tell Sean he needs a nap. Lol!
are you watching the Falcons???
the only thing better than that would be jamming otis whilst working *at* Penthouse. Ask Steven.
Spike in bomb-making among kids thx 2the Internet: Explosions up... Tee pee'd houses down. Everything has a cost. http://tinyurl.com/56qzz6
Study: Saliva test predicts colds wks in advance. I can make tee times wks in advance *and* have an excuse for missing work.Thx Scientists!
Lunch lady quits after her ex-porn star past is discovered. Yes on the hot dog, but no cream of *anything* soup. http://tinyurl.com/5gynx2
OnStar has a GPS that allows police to remotely slow ur car. Whats next? A GPS leg so I kick my own ass for them and then run into custody!
Palin's Alaska Church Damaged in Suspicious Fire: "Suspicious"... no shit. The fire danger in AK is the same as Palin's IQ. SUPER LOW!
Issac Newton's haiku: 5 5 5 5 5, 7 7 7 Sev, 5 5 5 5 5
It is 5:30 on a Friday and I am still in the office. The lone ranger! I am stuck in Blackberry tech support hell. Its a black(berry) hole!
At work wearing slacks, a polo and an argyle sweater vest (yes im str8) boss says "oh casual Friday" Good thing I put those jeans back.
My motto when I was single: Alpha Kenny Body. Say it out loud to one of your friends, it will come to you.
I just found out that I am now the only one in my office that drinks coffee. So much for pretending that spill wasn't mine. Damn!
The TP at my work is too thin. It tears 1 square at a time. I'm going to be here forever. Breakfast burritos are the devil!
My bulldogs balls just dropped. He goes around T-bagging the carpet. Spiders crawling in my mouth while sleeping are the least of my worries
Standing in line at the bank. shifting weight from 1 leg to another, cursing that turkey day calorie fest. stupid stuffing.
Why do people do the 1cuff on their jeans? Double cuff, or have them hemmed. You could also buy jeans that fit, but they wont be on sale.
Its frigid 2day in our nations capital. My seat heaters warm my buns, but everthing else is cool like the other side of the pillow.
I have new and exciting ways of doing everything. I dont push the envelope, I lick it!
Why do they put an "LL" and a "UL" button inside of 2 level elevators? Once the doors close, you're pretty much committed to one direction.
Levitra says that high blood pressure causes erectile disfunction. I thought that high blood pressure causes erections. WTF?
I am getting my tweet ON today! Filthy keys must be punished. My keyboard is begging for mercy. You call that begging??? Take THIS!!!
Santa: I want a festive, yet accurate depiction of this x-mas. Wow! It's an *empty* stocking and it's *in* the fireplace? He got my letter!
Since he will be prez, we should prolly add Barack to the spell checks. Backtrack, barrack & bareback show up now. Doesnt tell a good story.
Is that the Cincinnati Bearcats, or Bengals playing the Redskins?Skins are losing,it must be the Bearcats. Must be prepping 4the Orangebowl
Sunday is prime nap day! However, NFL is on at 1pm (ideal nap time). Football or rest? Why do I always have to make the tough decisions? zzz
I just watched a local academic game show: America's future leaders. Cheerleaders performed at intermission: America's future single moms.
How long can I do these annoying Travel Tweets? Infinity, because I am staying home for the holidays! Yipeeee!!! #notrvavel4me
What is my favorite dog command? Is it fetch, sit, or roll over? Nope.. It's STAY. #notravel4me
Q. What's the best way to get out of a holiday traffic jam? A. Don't get into one. #notravel4me
The best part about after Christmas is not having to travel back home because you're already there. Sweeeet! #notravel4me
Everyone is traveling for the holidays, but I'm going to a much better place, it's on the inside of my eyelids. Ahhhh! #notravel4me
Check out @thepeoplegeek's homepage, Its hysterical. It takes me way back.Um I mean I've never seen that video b4. http://tinyurl.com/2g9mqh
I can't control my urge to tweet. It wakes me up in the middle of the night. Maybe I should wear Twepends, so I don't tweet in my pants.
Just as I realize there is no sesame in my sesame chicken, I get the feeling that it isnt chicken in my sesame chicken either. #wheresmycat?
Wife doing a x-word.Needs a 5 letter word: a __ in ones armor.Asian UPS guy rings the doorbell & I answer the door as I reply chink!whoops
I just realized that 4 hours ago I spelled weird as weired. It's not that hared of a wored to spell is it?
Can't never could? wait so you're saying can't as well, but ina tricky way. #nonsensecliches
Can't never could? wait so you're saying can't as well, but in a trick way
Early bird catches the worm? yeah, it also has to make the coffee and everyone else drinks it. #nonsensecliches
1 mans trash is anothers treasure? Sure if the 1 man is throwing away money. #nonsensecliches
Here ia a weired irony: I am going to the dullest man on earth to get my shoes shined.
Had to cancel my bank card for fraud. Bank didn't send my new card, they forgot? Sitting at teller window waiting to get an interim gif ...
